section.name: Downloads
section.p:
OpenJMS releases are available in both install and source archives from the
SourceForge download page
For convenience, they are provided in zip and tar/gzip formats.

subsection.name: Install archives
subsection.p:
The following install archives are available for download:
openjms-@RELEASE-VERSION@.zip
openjms-@RELEASE-VERSION@.tar.gz

These include:
The OpenJMS server
The OpenJMS client JARS
3rd party JARS required by the client and server
The complete set of documentation
Scripts to run the server on Windows and UNIX
Sample programs

subsection.name: Source archives
subsection.p:
The following source archives are available for download:
openjms-@RELEASE-VERSION@-src.zip
openjms-@RELEASE-VERSION@-src.tar.gz

The source distributions are a clean CVS checkout of the OpenJMS sources at the time the version was released.
These can be used to build an install archive of OpenJMS.
